site.description: Releases of Eclipse-based tools from SureLogic, Inc.

category-def.name: Flashlight
category-def.label: Flashlight
category-def.description: Flashlight is a dynamic analysis tool that supports postmortem concurrency analysis.

category-def.name: JSure
category-def.label: JSure
category-def.description: JSure is an analysis-based verification tool.

category-def.name: Sierra
category-def.label: Sierra
category-def.description: Sierra is a rules-based static analysis toolkit supporting team collaboration.
